title: Someone hacked my account and changed the email.
body:
Some one hacked my account, MyStrugglEzreal, and changed the email so i can't change the password so it doesn't happen again. Can anyone from Riot OCE help me change it back. I'm willing to answer some questions. I've spent hundreds of dollars on my account wouldn't want to lose it.

Thanks MyStrugglEzreal

replies.body:
Hey mate,

The best way is to send in a support ticket - the support team can help you establish ownership and get the account back in your control.

Cheers
Mindstar
Whats a support ticket? Thanks for the help.

This is the general support page which even a direct link to recovering accounts:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us


This is the link to the account recovery ticket, but you can submit tickets for a lot of different things (just that most have been answered if you go through the stuff via the first link):

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=38154
